overview_of_class:
MAT_SCI 380 Ultrahigh vacuum and surface preparation techniques. Principles of surface analytical techniques, including Auger electron spectroscopy, photoemission, low energy electron diffraction, energy loss spectroscopy and scanning probe microscopy. Surface dynamics and thermodynamics. Electronic properties. Gas-surface interactions.

Relationship to Department Objectives
Supports 1, 2, 3, 5, 15, and 16
name: Intro Surface Science & Spectroscopy
subject: MAT_SCI
